attributes.action: Stop Grantham Lincolnshire A+E from closeing at nights
attributes.background: Grantham Lincolnshire A+E is very much need department in the town of Grantham Lincolnshire it has a main north and south Road a1 to London and Scotland the town is growing every month with more houses which the next hospital from here is Lincoln or Boston which are already pushing there limits

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of United Lincolnshire Hospitals NHS Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament.
